UpdateData.ReleaseNotes:
Update for 3.2-3-4 and Improvements
♦ Added missing and new block types (ElderMap, DisableDropSound, GemLevel, StackSize, HasExplicitMod, PlayEffect, MinimapIcon, CustomSound, MapTier) ♦ Added section features ♦ Added search feature to the sections tab ♦ Added theme support to some existing and new block types ♦ Improved parsing of sections/comments ♦ Fixed some bugs
